guidanceItem.Priority: J.D. Meier, Alex Mackman, Michael Dunner, Srinath Vasireddy, Ray Escamilla and Anandha Murukan
guidanceItem.title: Content directories have deny write ACE for anonymous Internet accounts.
guidanceItem.content:
Applies to

  • Web Application

What to Check For

Check to ensure that write access to Web content directories is denied for anonymous internet accounts.

Adapted from Microsoft patterns & practices guidance.
